newsitem.title: USA: National City names Elliott vice chairman.
newsitem.headline: National City names Elliott vice chairman.

text.p: National City Bancshares Inc appointed on Friday executive vice president Michael Elliott as vice chairman of the bank holding company, effective immediately.
The appointment is part of the company's plans for succession of chairman John Lippert, who has announced plans to retire at the end of the year, National City said.
Elliott now serves as chairman and chief executive of The National City Bank of Evansville and also is a director and executive vice president of the parent company.

"Mike has played a key role in the expansion of our company," Lippert said in a statement. "The board is extremely pleased to have a competent banker in Mike to lead our company into the next century."
